item.title: Vengance recoil?

item.description:
@Gh0st_Jr wrote:

Ok, so im trying to get my vengance to recoilâ€¦ as in delay. and i dont know how to make it delay. this is what i have:case 4169://vengence { if(playerIsMember == 1) if(actionTimer == 0){ { actionTimer = 10; stillgfx(465, absY, absX); for(int I = 0; I < 20; I++) { } for(int I = 0; I <= 6; I++) { strPot = true; strPotTimer = 90; cba = abc / 10; abc2 = cba * 2; if (abc2 <= 1) { abc2 = 2; } updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; break; } inCombat(); attackPlayersWithin(600, 17, 1); setAnimation(1658); txt4 = "Taste Vengance!"; string4UpdateRequired = true; RemoveAllWindows(); } } } if(playerIsMember == 0) sendMessage("You need to be a member to cast vengeance!"); break;
